Message:
Since then, the two of us have
been living in Master’s town.

Today, Big Sis and I are going
shopping together.

There’s so many cool things
to see in town.

But, I guess at some point
I must’ve gotten separated
from Big Sis.

I’m not gonna cry though,
’cause, see?

She held my hand so that
I wouldn’t get lost anymore.
Big Sis’s hand is so warm...

As we walked home
into the sunset,

our two shadows walked
side by side behind us.

Even our shadows are
best friends, huh Big Sis?

Oh look, there’s Master!
He came to get us!
Come on, Big Sis, let’s go!
